changes: Implemented new Spotify auth path: [Proof Key for Code Exchange](https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/general/guides/authorization-guide/#authorization-code-flow-with-proof-key-for-code-exchange-pkce)
Lyrics only get updated when track change
Fixed the app using expired auth causing no access
Site speed improved by a lot
Removed Youtube video player and options (for now)
Removed ability to change Spotify playback device (for now)
Improved overall app flow for getting user authorization
Added information about current Genius lyrics
Able to detect and romanize Russian lyrics
Can set the current playback time of the current Spotify track
User can set volume of current playback device
Can view and navigate to all artists on current track
